settings.sub_title1: Our technical team is ready to discuss your design, recommend materials, and optimize for production efficiency.
settings.sub_title2: We provide A4 swatches and sample yardage. Bring your vision to life before committing to bulk production.
settings.sub_title3: Your custom designs are your intellectual property. We guarantee strict Confidentiality and exclusivity.
settings.sub_title4: From boutique orders to large-scale manufacturing, our facility is equipped to handle your volume needs.

settings.content:
Fominte is a vertically integrated modern textile enterprise headquartered in Suzhou,

the "World Textile Capital," with R&D and design innovation based in Shenzhen and manufacturing operations in Xuzhou.

settings.html:
Who we are?

Our mission is to be the industry leader of innovative textiles, showcasing the quality and charm of China's intelligent manufacturing to the world. We believe in building lasting partnerships by deeply understanding our clients' design needs and providing a reliable, end-to-end production solution that brings their vision to life.

settings.content: No matter where you are, no matter what you need, Fominte is ready to deliver reliable fabric and exceptional garments with professionalism, integrity, and innovation.

Our mission is to be the industry leader of innovative textiles, showcasing the quality and charm of China's intelligent manufacturing to the world. We believe in building lasting partnerships by deeply understanding our clients' design needs and providing a reliable, end-to-end production solution that brings their vision to life.
